history.title: History & Psychology Behind Fortune Cookie Messages
history.introPrefix: While often associated with Chinese cuisine in Western culture, the
history.introSuffix: . A similar cracker called "tsujiura senbei" was sold in Kyoto with paper fortunes tucked inside. The modern, vanilla-sweetened version was popularized in California in the early 20th century. Learn more about
history.psychologyPrefix: The appeal of fortune cookies is linked to the
history.psychologySuffix: —a psychological phenomenon where individuals believe vague, general statements apply specifically to them. The positive, open-ended nature of fortune cookie messages allows us to project our hopes and dreams onto the text, creating a moment of personal connection and delight.

notChinese.title: Not Actually Chinese
notChinese.content: Fortune cookies likely originated in Japan, not China. A Japanese cracker called "tsujiura senbei" dates back to 19th-century Kyoto.

billionsServed.title: Billions Served
billionsServed.content: Approximately 3 billion fortune cookies are produced globally every year, with the vast majority consumed in the United States.

lotteryWinners.title: Lottery Winners
lotteryWinners.content: A surprising number of people have won lottery jackpots by playing the "lucky numbers" found on the back of their fortune cookie slips!

howToWrite.title: How to Write Your Own Fortune Cookie Messages
howToWrite.introPrefix: Creating your own fortune cookie messages is an art that combines brevity, positivity, and just the right amount of mystery. The best fortunes are short, uplifting, and open-ended enough for readers to find personal meaning. Whether you're making
howToWrite.introSuffix: or crafting messages for an event, these principles will guide you.

principles.one: Use second person 'you' to create personal connection
principles.two: Keep messages open-ended for reader projection
principles.three: Avoid specific dates or numbers (except lucky numbers)
principles.five: Mix short punchy sentences with longer reflective ones
principles.six: Use timeless language that resonates across generations

templates.one: Soon, you will discover a new opportunity in [work/love/creativity].
templates.two: Your patience today will bring unexpected rewards tomorrow.
templates.three: A chance encounter will lead to lasting friendship.
templates.four: The path you least expect will bring the greatest joy.
templates.five: Your kindness will return to you tenfold.
templates.six: A decision you make this week will shape your future.
templates.seven: Trust your instincts—they know the way.
templates.eight: Someone is thinking of you with great affection.

howToWrite.ctaStrong: Don't want to write from scratch?
howToWrite.ctaSuffix: Let our AI create personalized fortune cookie messages for you.
